item.title: image binarization and pixel count
item.description: References : https://haesleinhuepf.github.io/BioImageAnalysisNotebooks/intro.html Questions : what is thresholding and binarization how can we calculate the relative area of certain object in the image. One of the critical aspects of image analysis involves quantifying pixel data, a process that’s integral to various scientific and medical applications. In this blog, we’ll try to explore the process of converting microscopic images into binary representations for pixel counting. Steps involved Conversion to Gray Images First, raw microscopic images are converted to grayscale images.
